name: Sheepshead
text: DON!! x1 Your Turn: Give all of your opponent's Characters -1 cost.

effect.text: Give all of your opponent's Characters -1 cost.

meta.notes: Card marked as 'SAMPLE' and 'Morehand' in the image, but these are not part of the card's official data. The card ID is OP08-083, which is clearly printed at the bottom right.
